snippet: The Web giant is in talks with smaller established galleries to begin offering contemporary and other fine art, moving well beyond posters and prints.
abstract: Amazon is in talks with smaller established galleries to begin selling contemporary and other fine art online; expected decision will represent the Web giant's re-entry into art world, after an early unsuccessful try, joining several well-established players in market that is now edging into six-figure prices.
lead_paragraph: The Web giant is in talks with smaller established galleries to begin offering contemporary and other fine art, moving well beyond posters and prints.

headline.main: Amazon Is Poised to Re-Enter Web Art Market
headline.print_headline: A New and Giant Player Looms in Web Art Sales
